subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=えち, せ, せち
|kanon=えつ, せい, せつ
|kanyoon=ぜい
|kun=と-く
|nanori=あき, かぬ, かね, こと, さとし, つぐ, とき, とく, のぶ, ひさ
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|説明|せつめい}}: an [[explanation]]; to [[explain]]
* {{ja-r|説得|せっとく}}: [[persuasion]], [[persuade]]
* {{ja-r|説得力|せっとくりょく}}: [[persuasive]] [[force]], [[persuasiveness]]
* {{ja-r|逆説|ぎゃくせつ}}: a [[paradox]]
* {{ja-r|仏説|ぶっせつ}}: the [[saying]]s or [[teaching]]s of [[Buddha]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
